resources.string: you are now familiar enough with your %1$s to identify it. It is %2$s.
Interaction of different types of magic has erased the glyph on this barding!
The armor glyph was not compatible with the new magic, but you were able to suppress its erasure with your magic ability!
This %1$s provides damage absorption up to \"%2$d\" points per attack.
\n\nBecause of your inadequate Honesty, your movement speed and defense skill are decreased.
\n\nBecause of your inadequate Honesty, wearing this barding will decrease your movement speed and defense skill.
\n\nTypical %1$s provides damage absorption up to %2$d points per attack and requires %3$d points of Honesty.
This barding probably requires more Honesty than you have.
, and because it is cursed, you are powerless to remove it.
\n\nYou can feel a malevolent magic lurking within the %s.

This ancient orichalcum suit of barding provides unmatched protection for those rare ponies honest enough to shoulder its massive burden. There\'s no saddle, but it has a linked helm that prevents ponies with horns from wearing it.
Ponies with horns can\'t wear this barding! The helmet is permanently fixed to the neck plate, and there is no room for a horn.

This is the most gaudy, ridiculous, outrageous outfit you\'ve ever seen in your life. It\'s perfect! The bard wearing this harlequin costume can enter a frenzied _Sugar Rush_, producing a temporary boost to laughter.
Only bards can wear this costume!
You need to be wearing this barding to use its special power!
This lightweight barding offers basic protection. It\'s so light, even dishonest ne\'er-do-well\'s can use it with little difficulty.
With the help of this mantle, the Elf can summon the forces of nature itself. High grass will grow in the blink of an eye even through solid stone, immobilizing all enemies in sight.
Only Elves can use this barding!

It\'s a yoke, vest, and legband, which mark you as a member of the Plant Team charged with wrapping-up Winter. A yoked farmer can _Harvest_ grass. After activating the ability, stepping on tall grass will satisfy hunger. Just don\'t tell anypony about the Secret of Grass, or you\'ll ruin the food market. Eating grass doesn\'t count as eating a piece of food, so it won\'t restore any health.
Only farmers can wear this outfit!

A Huntress in such cloak can create a fan of _Spectral Blades_. Each of these blades will target a single enemy in the Huntress\'s field of view, inflicting damage depending on her currently equipped melee weapon.
Only Huntresses can use this barding!
This barding is made from tightly-woven and chemically treated cloth. It features a gaudy-looking brass saddle. The purpose of saddles is a complete mystery to you.
Wearing this gorgeous robe, a Mage can cast a spell of molten earth: all the enemies in his field of view will be set on fire and will be unable to move at the same time.
Only Mages can use this barding!
Interlocking metal links make for a tough but flexible suit of barding.
Enormous plates of metal are joined together to form this heavy barding designed only for the honest and true. It features a steel saddle.
Wearing this dark garb, a Rogue can perform a trick called _Smoke Bomb_ (though no real explosives are used): he blinds enemies who can see him and jumps aside.
Only Rogues can use this barding!
You can only jump to an empty location in your field of view
Choose a location to jump to
The metal scales sewn onto a thick pleather vest create a flexible yet highly protective barding. It includes a red pleather saddle.

This barding is made of old spider carcases and some strange cloth. Surprisingly enough, it seems that it still contains functional spinnerets. If you apply enough pressure on one of the plates it shoots cobweb. Spiky surface of boot soles allows you to walk on that web freely.
A blood red plates of this barding is sewed together with dark red chains. It irradiates chaotic energy as you touch it.

This tempered steel plate barding with gold saddle and helm is designed for the dedicated earth ponies who defend the Crown. Although it looks very heavy, it allows a royal guard to perform a _Heroic Leap_ toward a target location. Slamming into the ground will stun all adjacent enemies.
Only royal guards can wear this armor!
